title: Canada Region
description: From Asaf's Team perspective- this is estimated as a 1 week effort.

title: Increased app catalog
description:
Currently we have 19K apps that can be added tot the catalog, However there are some limitations preventing us from doing so:
1. Paging support in UI- Asaf estimated this to be 2 days effort. We can push for it if needed
2. Different mechanism than current .json for policy- will create an unusually big file. A design review is needed, probably threat cloud based
2. Description added to name and URL
3. No overlap with existing services
TBD

title: MCP- Server Discovery & Monitoring
description:
As an IT Security Manager, I want to:

See all active MCP servers in my organization so I can understand our AI attack surface.
Monitor MCP server usage and data types.
Track which users and AI agents are accessing which servers so I can audit access patterns

As a Compliance Officer, I want to:

Generate reports on AI data access activities so I can meet regulatory requirements
Track sensitive data exposure through MCP servers so I can ensure data protection compliance

title: MCP- Activity Classification & Risk Assessment
description:
As a Security Analyst, I want to:

Distinguish between different types of MCP activities (tool execution vs. resource access vs. context provision) so I can prioritize security responses
See risk scores for MCP sessions so I can focus on the highest-risk activities
Understand which tools and functions AI agents are using so I can assess potential impact

title: MCP- Policy Management & Enforcement
description:
As an IT Administrator, I want to:

Create policies that block high-risk MCP activities so I can prevent security incidents
Set up alerts for policy violations so I can respond quickly to issues
Manage AI agent permissions centrally so I can maintain consistent security controls

title: MCP- Workflow Visibility
description:
As an IT Operations Manager, I want to:

See active AI workflows and their performance metrics so I can optimize system efficiency
Monitor cross-system data flows so I can understand dependencies and potential failure points
Track workflow success rates and execution times so I can identify performance issues

title: MCP- Server Discovery
description:
1.1 Automatic Detection

Scan network for active MCP servers
Identify server types (filesystem, database, API, etc.)
Detect server capabilities and exposed tools
Track server status (healthy, warning, error)

1.2 Server Inventory

Maintain real-time inventory of all MCP servers
Store server metadata (version, endpoints, authentication)
Track server dependencies and relationships
Monitor resource consumption metrics

1.3 Health Monitoring

Track server uptime and availability
Monitor response times and performance
Alert on server failures or degraded performance
Historical performance trending
